name: Otto
description: '''Otto Maximiliano Pereira de Cordeiro Ferreira''' (born June 28, 1968), known [[Mononymous person|mononymously]] as '''Otto''', is a Brazilian singer-songwriter, drummer, and television actor and presenter, famous for being one of the founding members of the pioneering [[Mangue Bit]] band [[Mundo Livre S/A]], of which he served as its drummer from 1984 to 1996.
